dataset_id: CAMEX-4 DC-8 METEOROLOGICAL MEASUREMENT SYSTEM (MMS) V1
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: CAMEX-4 DC-8 METEOROLOGICAL MEASUREMENT SYSTEM (MMS) V1
summary: The CAMEX-4 DC-8 Meteorological Measurement System (MMS) was collected by the MMS, which consists of three major systems: an air-motion sensing system to measure air velocity with respect to the aircraft, an aircraft-motion sensing system to measure the aircraft velocity with respect to the Earth, and a data acquisition system to sample, process, and record the measured quantities. The MMS data was collected during the CAMEX-4 campaign to study physical properties of atmospheric temperature.
